A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Like three movies. Only one of them good. The most boring of the three is basically ships chasing each other slowly for an hour. The only good story has Rey and Luke and some Kylo. Elements here\, including a fight scene\, are simply thrilling. The rest is basically lifeless and devoid of the snark that laced the first one of these three. Must be the loss of Han.
